I had a background in agriculture, though my agronomy chops were weak. Still, I dreamed of being a plant breeder & somehow got accepted into Kansas program. Hard to imagine how different my life would now be if I had gone there instead of Purdue. These are The Imponderables.

This tweet brings to mind life's funny twists & turns. After 2-year rural agriculture assignment in Peace Corps Senegal I very nearly went to grad school in agronomy at U. Kansas. Did Ag Econ @ Purdue instead. Then spent 25 years in computer/software biz in/around Silicon Valley. https://t.co/V4AoALnrYS
